# Basic Azure DevOps Environments Example

This example demonstrates a basic Azure DevOps environment with minimal configuration.

## Features

- Creates a single environment
- Demonstrates basic module usage patterns
- Uses variables for configuration flexibility

## Key Configuration

This example demonstrates:
- Basic environment creation
- Variable-driven naming

## Usage

```bash
terraform init
terraform plan
terraform apply
```

## Cleanup

```bash
terraform destroy
```
